snippet: President Obama at Camp Pendleton, Calif., on Wednesday, said budgetary cuts were “not how a great nation should be treating its military and military families.”
abstract: Pres Obama vows in speech before nearly 3,000 Marines, sailors and their families that he will fight to end across-the-board budget cuts that have shaken the military.
lead_paragraph: President Obama at Camp Pendleton, Calif., on Wednesday, said budgetary cuts were “not how a great nation should be treating its military and military families.”

headline.main: Obama, Before a Military Audience, Vows to End Across-the-Board Cuts
headline.print_headline: Obama, Before a Military Audience, Vows to End Across-the-Board Cuts

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
keywords.name: subject
